feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T06C17 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 28, 10:00 - 12:00 UTC

Mar 6, 23:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified rack.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 28/04/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 28/04/2025 12:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in rack T06C17.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM/RBX][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 04:30 - 08:30 UTC

Mar 19, 22:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 03/04/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 03/04/2025 08:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [YNM][Network] - Network disruption
entry.content:
Mar 31, 10:14 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Network offering, which is causing temporary Availability issues in the YNM DC.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 31/03/2025 09:35 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The network service is temporarily degraded for dedicated servers.
Customers Impact : Customers may experience some network slowness or packet loss on their dedicated servers.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [WAW][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
entry.content:
Mar 26, 16:20 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 26, 14:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 24, 17:33 UTC
Scheduled - We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance window for our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 26/03/2025 14:30 UTC
End time : 26/03/2025 15:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts:
- Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
- Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation as we work to improve our platform and provide you with the best possible service.
